meanings.definition: An act or instance of judging wrongly or unfairly.
meanings.sent1: Her misjudgment of the situation led to unnecessary conflict.
meanings.sent2: The misjudgment of his character caused misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: His misjudgment of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The misjudgment in her choice of words painted a confusing picture.
meanings.sent5: The misjudgment in her decision left a lasting impact.

meanings.definition: A wrong or unfair opinion or decision.
meanings.sent1: The misjudgment of his abilities hindered his progress.
meanings.sent2: Her misjudgment of the situation led to regrettable outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The misjudgment in his taste in music was evident to all.
meanings.sent4: The misjudgment in her evaluation of the painting was clear.
meanings.sent5: His misjudgment of her intentions caused tension.
